description: Sends an email to a user with login details. If passwords in the system are hashed, a new password will be generated and sent. The input should be a valid email address, or a user_id and username that matches
name: GrapeForgotPassword

email.description: E-mail for the user to reset

username.description: Username for the user to reset (use in conjunction with user_id)

user_id.description: user_id for the user to reset (use in conjunction with username)

message.description: If an error occurred, a message will be provided

error.description: If an error occurred, this field will contain the error object
